relation: You may remember them for such things as
Homer and the gang mistake this singer for somebody's Valentine gift
This singer and his wife give Lisa some sage advice on her new lifestyle
This band causes extra friction between the two halves of Springfield
This duo runs the musical summer camp that Lisa attends
Somehow Homer convinces this band to play in his garage
Bart has a run in with this duo while learning to play the drums
The king of feeling good performs on a poorly built bandstand
Who else could play a magical space coyote?
Marge has a close encounter with her favourite singer
This singer and his little friends rock spring break in Florida
The pop singer who presents the Springfield Pride Awards with Kent Brockman
One of the many bands attending Lollapalooza
Otto's favourite band, until they tell him to never listen to their music again
They can't get enough of that new taste sensation!
Almost became US president thanks to Homer's TV show
Held a private performance for Bart and Homer
Marge painted dozens of portraits of this drummer
One of the many celebrities you can see in Capital City
Saved from performing at Moe's only to end up on Krusty's show
This singer is also on the Komeback Special when she isn't cleaning up highways
El Viaje Misterioso de Nuestro Jomer
The Mook, The Chef, The Wife & Her Homer
pageTitle: Simpson Musician Bonanza Quiz - By RicardoMOFunk
